Title: Sucker Punch
Overview: A young girl, institutionalised by her abusive stepfather, retreats to an alternative reality as a coping strategy and envisions a plan to help her escape.
Keywords: brothel, fantasy, asylum, reality, escape, robot, violence, inmate, alternative, imagination, lobotomy
production_companies: Legendary Pictures, Warner Bros., Lennox House Films, Cruel and Unusual Films
Cast: Emily Browning, Abbie Cornish, Jena Malone
